data.actual_result: You're jumped back to the previously jumped to message in chat
data.expected_result: You're kept at the most recent messages as before you changed your client language
data.short_description: Client jumps back to previously visited jumped to message after switching language
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel - Jump to a message in the channel (can use search, pinned, or recent mentions) - Press the ESC key to jump back to the recent messages of the chat - Go into your User Settings -> Language and switch to another language then exit your User Settings - Observe that you're now jumped back to the previously jumped to message
